rotate_rotation_bar.description: Rotate the rotation bar to adjust the lamp's position.

rotate_head.description: Rotate the lamp head to change the lamp's light direction.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to prevent dust accumulation.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, bar, and lamp head.

manipulate_whole_lamp.description: Adjust the position and light direction of the lamp by rotating the bar and head.
